ROOT:
-- DaoT_CurrentWorkflow_S3_Update -- 2014/7/4 日立 太郎 UPDATE [T_CurrentWorkflow] SET
[WorkflowControlNo] = @Set_WorkflowControlNo_forUPD, [HistoryNo] = @Set_HistoryNo_forUPD, [WfPositionId] = @Set_WfPositionId_forUPD, [FromUserId] = @Set_FromUserId_forUPD, [FromUserInfo] = @Set_FromUserInfo_forUPD, [ActionType] = @Set_ActionType_forUPD, [ToUserId] = @Set_ToUserId_forUPD, [ToUserInfo] = @Set_ToUserInfo_forUPD, [NextWfPositionId] = @Set_NextWfPositionId_forUPD, [ReserveArea] = @Set_ReserveArea_forUPD, [ExclusiveKey] = @Set_ExclusiveKey_forUPD, [ReplyDeadline] = @Set_ReplyDeadline_forUPD, [CreatedDate] = @Set_CreatedDate_forUPD, [AcceptanceDate] = @Set_AcceptanceDate_forUPD,
WHERE [WorkflowControlNo] = @WorkflowControlNo
